title: Data Handling
chunk_text: Crew schedules must not be emailed to external domains or personal mailboxes.

title: Access Control
chunk_text: Privilege escalations require approval and must not coincide with failed login spikes.

title: Crew Scheduling Portal Access Restriction
clause_text: Cabin Crew may not access the Crew Scheduling Portal outside 05:00–23:00 GST.

title: Crew Rest Period Compliance
clause_text: All crew members must complete mandatory rest periods as per GCAA regulations before accessing scheduling systems.

title: Flight Operations Portal Security
clause_text: Unauthorized access attempts to the Flight Operations Portal must trigger an immediate security alert and account lockout after 3 failed attempts.

title: Payroll System Data Download Control
clause_text: Data downloads from the Payroll System are restricted to HR Managers and must be logged with a timestamp and user ID.

title: Employee Records Access Control
clause_text: Employee records in the Employee Records Database can only be accessed by HR personnel with valid credentials during business hours (08:00–18:00 GST).

title: Flight Operations Software Update Protocol
clause_text: Only IT Admins with elevated privileges can perform software updates on the Flight Operations Portal, and updates must be logged with a change request ID.

title: Pilot Certification Update Requirement
clause_text: Pilots must update their flight certifications in the Employee Self-Service Portal at least 48 hours before their next scheduled flight.

title: VPN Security for Non-UAE Access
clause_text: All VPN connections from non-UAE locations must use multi-factor authentication and be monitored for unusual activity.

title: Cargo Tracking System Access and Export
clause_text: Access to the Cargo Tracking System is restricted to Cargo Managers and Supervisors, with all data exports requiring approval from a department head.

title: Employee Records Deletion Protocol
clause_text: Data deletion in the Employee Records Database is restricted to HR Managers and requires a secondary approval from a senior HR officer.

title: Network Security Scan Scheduling
clause_text: All security scans on the Network Security Dashboard must be scheduled during non-peak hours (00:00–04:00 GST) to avoid system performance degradation.

title: Booking System Security for Travel Agents
clause_text: Travel Agents accessing the Booking Management System must use encrypted connections, and sessions will auto-terminate after 15 minutes of inactivity.
